alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 2:54AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Trego and Ellis Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
